transcription: This is in response to your challenge that you've thrown across the province of Newfoundland and Labrador to Dance NL. Not only have the mayors and the councillors of the Bay St. George region here to dance, but also members from both sides of the House of Assembly have joined us for it and the community has turned out in droves to dance with us. As you should see here in a second.  Here boys!  Oh  Music
